SELECT PP.PROD_ID , PP.PROD_CL_CD , F_GET_CODE_NAME('CU005', PP.PROD_CL_CD) AS PROD_CL_NM , PP.FST_CRER_ID , IFNULL((SELECT USER_NM FROM CU_USER WHERE USER_ID = PP.FST_CRER_ID), PP.FST_CRER_ID) AS FST_CRER_NM , DATE_FORMAT(PP.FST_CRE_DTM, '%Y.%m.%d') AS FST_CRE_DTM , PP.AUDIT_ID , IFNULL((SELECT USER_NM FROM CU_USER WHERE USER_ID = PP.AUDIT_ID), PP.AUDIT_ID) AS AUDIT_NM , DATE_FORMAT(PP.AUDIT_DTM, '%Y.%m.%d') AS AUDIT_DTM , PP.PROD_NM , PP.DISPLAY_YN , PP.PROD_DISCOUNT_RATE , FORMAT(PP.PROD_PRICE , 0) AS PROD_PRICE , PP.PROD_MARKET , PP.PROD_CTT , IF((SELECT PP.FST_CRE_DTM BETWEEN DATE(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -#{ssDateControlDay} DAY)) AND NOW() FROM DUAL) = '1', 'Y', 'N') AS NEW_YN FROM PR_PROD PP WHERE 1 = 1 AND PP.DISPLAY_YN = 'Y'
AND F_GET_CODE_NAME('CU005', PP.PROD_CL_CD) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%')
AND PP.PROD_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%')
ORDER BY PP.PROD_DISCOUNT_RATE DESC, PP.FST_CRE_DTM DESC

SELECT PP.PROD_ID , PP.PROD_CL_CD , F_GET_CODE_NAME('CU005', PP.PROD_CL_CD) AS PROD_CL_NM , PP.FST_CRER_ID , IFNULL((SELECT USER_NM FROM CU_USER WHERE USER_ID = PP.FST_CRER_ID), PP.FST_CRER_ID) AS FST_CRER_NM , DATE_FORMAT(PP.FST_CRE_DTM, '%Y.%m.%d') AS FST_CRE_DTM , PP.AUDIT_ID , IFNULL((SELECT USER_NM FROM CU_USER WHERE USER_ID = PP.AUDIT_ID), PP.AUDIT_ID) AS AUDIT_NM , DATE_FORMAT(PP.AUDIT_DTM, '%Y.%m.%d') AS AUDIT_DTM , PP.PROD_NM , PP.DISPLAY_YN , PP.PROD_DISCOUNT_RATE , FORMAT(PP.PROD_PRICE , 0) AS PROD_PRICE , PP.PROD_MARKET , PP.PROD_CTT FROM PR_PROD PP WHERE 1 = 1 AND PP.PROD_ID = #{prodId} AND PP.PROD_CL_CD = #{prodClCd} AND PP.DISPLAY_YN = 'Y'
